_source.text: (4:19 PM ET) NEW YORK (MarketWatch) -- Shares of Yelp YELP, -4.39% surged 7.1% in after-hours trade after the Internet review service reported better-than-expected second-quarter results, including a first-ever profit as a public company, and lifted its full-year sales outlook.

_source.text: About all I get out of this is that all official unemployment statistics are intentionally misleading, to make things seem better than they really are... and even people I would expect to tell the truth of the matter, are still hedging the data.

_source.text: After hours of deliberation, telephone calls, personal conversations, reading hundreds of pages of transcripts and asking for guidance from above, I have come to the determination that the United States can do better than John Bolton.
